about_the_game:
**Summary of the Story:**

Become a skilled swordsman and sneak into the territory of the evil Dragon Wizard, engaging in a thrilling battle between justice and darkness under the cover of night.

**Simple and intuitive operation:**

The game has Chinese voice guidance throughout the game, and you can easily take control by simply clicking the mouse. Even if you close your eyes to rest, you can fully immerse yourself in the game's fun.

**Just the Right Amount of Challenge:**

The game design is simple but not crude, and it sets an appropriate level of difficulty for players who enjoy a challenge.

**The Ultimate Test of Hearing:**

The game places a special emphasis on audio. Listen carefully to the footsteps of your enemies, train your reaction speed, and bravely move forward in a challenging and dangerous adventure.

**A Battle of Technique and Rhythm:**

Master the rhythm of attack and evasion, and experience the unique charm of becoming a true swordsman.

**Player Position:**

Whether you are looking for a relaxing and casual challenge or an adventurous game with a deep gaming experience, this game is your ideal choice.

**Immersive Experience:**

Blending fantasy elements with sound design, the game allows players to empathize with their characters and enjoy a realistic adventure.
